setStartDate(date)} />
); }; const mapStateToProps = (state) => { return { isLoged: state.isLoged, userId: state.userId, userInfo: state.userInfo, }; }; // const mapDispatchToProps =(dispatch) =>{ // return{ // onLoginSucceed:(userid,userinfo)=> dispatch({type:actionTypes.LOGED,userid:userid,userinfo}) // } // } export default connect(mapStateToProps, null)(FormInfo);
